idea-plugin.extensionPoints: <<error descr=" must not specify both 'name' and 'qualifiedName' attributes">extensionPoint name="myName" qualifiedName="myQualifiedName" interface="java.lang.Runnable"/> <<error descr=" must not specify both 'interface' and 'beanClass' attributes">extensionPoint interface="java.lang.Runnable" beanClass="java.lang.Runnable" name="aaa"/>
